description:
Well is made painfully aware that he still doesn`t understand nobles by a few words from Brantag. To make matters worse, he learns about the plots of his brother`s wife Amalie, the people living in his homeland, and the royal palace, leaving him less and less room to maneuver. After debating it for a while, he finally makes up his mind and takes action.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Between a Rock and a Hard Place? Are You Kidding Me?!
Pris en tenaille ? Dites-moi que je rêve !
板挟みって, それはないでしょう!
